app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps BUZO Video Status Maker
app_description: SHORT DESCRIPTION Convert your PHOTOS into VIDEOS with India s BEST VIDEO STATUS MAKER! Create VIDEO STATUS in ONE MINUTE! Create Lyrical Birthday and Anniversary Videos from your Photos. India s BEST VIDEO STATUS MAKER App! It s super easy to use this app. Choose the DEMO VIDEO you like Add your photos and EXPORT. You are done! LONG DESCRIPTION BUZO VIDEO STATUS MAKER has thousands of video templates through which you can convert your PHOTOS into awesome VIDEOS within a minute. Create your custom video status for free and share your work on apps like WhatsApp Facebook Instagram etc just with a touch. BUZO App has templates for all the events like BIRTHDAY VIDEO MAKERvideo status maker video editing app video status download status video birthday video maker ANNIVERSARY VIDEO MAKER LOVE VIDEO MAKER PUNJABI VIDEO MAKER WEDDING VIDEO MAKER LYRICAL VIDEO MAKER DIALOGUE VIDEO MAKER PARTICLE.LY VIDEO MAKER LYRICAL.LY VIDEO MAKER SAD VIDEO MAKER MAHADEV VIDEO MAKER INDEPENDENCE DAY VIDEO MAKER VALENTINE VIDEO MAKER COUPLE VIDEO MAKER BUZO app has a special collection for BLACK and WHITE videos which look stunning as STATUS on social apps like Whatsapp Instagram and Facebook. HOW TO USE Select your desired video and click on the create button. Choose photos or add the text you want to include in the videos. Click on the preview button to preview the video or Click on Export the Video and Save it. Easily save and share your created video status via social media. MY VIDEOS Created or saved videos can be easily found on My Videos and also you can share them or delete them directly from my videos. MARK AS FAVOURITES You can also mark any video which you like as a favorite and share it with your friends or revisit it whenever needed. SEARCH FOR VIDEOS If you are looking for any specific song or audio you can search for it on the search bar that fetches your relevant results. And you can also search in many different categories. Now create wonders and have an endless experience of sharing memories and moments with people all around the world.
